GULF OF GUINEA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 02-55N 001-56E AT 300424Z JAN.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS
   POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO MDAT-GOG,
   PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 060524Z FEB 21.
